author: rhuijben
msg: When locating the working copy from a path we try to open the SQLite database
in every directory. SQLite doesn't optimize for this and does a lot of
housekeeping (memory wise and io wise) with the assumption that you really
want to open an existing file or create a new database.
Performing a simple status check avoids all this pain, and improves performance
for every case except opening the working copy root itself.
(svn_wc__db_util_open_db): If not creating a new wc.db, perform a filestat
